wallet.title: Your Account

buyAroma.fieldHelper: Enter amount of AROMA to buy

WhatIsAroma.question: What is AROMA (ERC20)?
WhatIsAroma.answer: AROMA is CryptoChefs' in-kitchen currency that is required for all kinds of transactions such as: Buying an NFT, Creating a Recipe, Staking, Marketplace transactions, and so on.

WhatIsACryptochefNFT.question: What is a CryptoChef NFT?
WhatIsACryptochefNFT.answer: CryptoChef is the NFT that is issued on the Polygon Blockchain. CryptoChefs are unique tokens that represent the Chef and serve as a basis to participate in our CryptoKitchen game.

WhatIsARecipe.question: What is a Recipe?
WhatIsARecipe.answer: Recipes represent a Crypto Index Fund that a Chef believes will grow in value. It consists of a minimum of 3 and a maximum of 20 Cryptocurrencies (5% steps). Creating a recipe requires to own a CryptoChef and to lock-up AROMA tokens.

WhatIsTheBuffet.question: What is the Buffet?
WhatIsTheBuffet.answer: As the name suggests, the buffet is where all the active recipes and their details are displayed. It also contains historical performance data of the recipe and the accumulated rewards.

WhyDoIHaveToLockUpAroma.question: Why do I have to lock-up AROMA?
WhyDoIHaveToLockUpAroma.answer: We want to promote Chefs that put the time and effort into creating amazing recipes in which they really believe in. To prove your commitment, every Chef has to lock-up at least 200 AROMA tokens. The amount of locked-up tokens also influences your share of the reward pool - the more tokens you lock-up, the higher your share gets!

steps.buyAroma: Nice, seems like you are early! Get your hands on some AROMA to start your journey becoming one of our first Chefs!
steps.buyCHEF: Wow! I can smell tantalizing AROMAs in the air. These can bring magical CHEFS to life! Approve and purchase a CHEF before it's too late!
steps.waitForReveal: Congratulations, you are already a CHEF owner! Wait for the reveal, we're cooking something dangerously delicious! You have the ability to purchase more CHEFs in the meantime.
